src:
Ahok Mentahkan Isu Karir Baru di KPK
07 Nov 2019, 07:29 by Tim detikcom
Jakarta - Eks Gubernur DKI Jakarta, Basuki Tjahaja Purnama (Ahok) diisukan bakal berkarir menjadi Dewan Pengawas (Dewas) KPK. Isu itu pun buru-buru dibantah oleh Ahok.
Isu Ahok menjadi calon Dewas KPK itu ramai diperbincangkan. Tak sendirian, Ahok juga disandingkan dengan eks Ketua KPK Antasari Azhar.
Isu Ahok menjadi Dewas KPK kemudian dijawab oleh Presiden Joko Widodo (Jokowi). Tak membenarkan ataupun menepis, Jokowi hanya menjelaskan nama-nama Dewas KPK masih dalam penggodokan.
"Masih dalam penggodokan. Tetapi kita harapkan yang ada di sana (Dewan Pengawas KPK) memiliki integritas," kata Jokowi saat menjawab pertanyaan wartawan 'apakah nama Antasari dan Ahok masuk dalam bursa Dewas KPK', di Jiexpo Kemayoran, Jakarta, Rabu (6/11/2019).
text:
Ahok validates new career issues at the KPK
Nov 7 2019, 07:29 by Tim detikcom
Jakarta - Ex Governor of DKI Jakarta, Basuki Tjahaja Purnama (Ahok) is rumored to be having a career as a KPK Supervisory Board (Dewas). The issue was quickly denied by Ahok.
The issue of Ahok becoming a candidate for Dewas KPK was widely discussed. Not alone, Ahok was also juxtaposed with former KPK Chairman Antasari Azhar.
The issue of Ahok becoming Dewas KPK was later answered by President Joko Widodo (Jokowi). Not justifying or dismissing it, Jokowi only explained the names of Dewas KPK were still being drafted.
"It is still in the process of being formulated. But we expect those who are there (KPK Supervisory Board) to have integrity," Jokowi said when answering reporters 'questions whether the names Antasari and Ahok were included in the Dewas KPK bourse', at Jiexpo Kemayoran, Jakarta, Wednesday (6 / 11/2019).
